altername_name: The King of Fighters Portable 94-98: Chapter of Orochi
name: The King of Fighters Collection: The Orochi Saga
overview: The King of Fighters Collection: The Orochi Saga contains emulated versions of the first five games in the King of Fighters series: The King of Fighters '94 The King of Fighters '95 The King of Fighters '96 The King of Fighters '97 The King of Fighters '98: Dream Match Never Ends The package also includes a Challenge mode, where you can unlock over two hundred bonus goodies, like character art and music from the games.
